com.motorolasolutions.adc.decoder

Interface BarCodeReader.PreviewCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    BarCodeReader

    public static interface BarCodeReader.PreviewCallback
    Callback interface used to deliver copies of preview frames as they are displayed.
    See Also:
    BarCodeReader.setOneShotPreviewCallback(BarCodeReader.PreviewCallback), BarCodeReader.setPreviewCallbackWithBuffer(BarCodeReader.PreviewCallback), BarCodeReader.startPreview()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPreviewFrame(byte[] data, BarCodeReader reader)
      Called as preview frames are displayed.

    • Method Detail

      • onPreviewFrame

        void onPreviewFrame(byte[] data,
                  BarCodeReader reader)
        Called as preview frames are displayed. This callback is invoked on the event thread BarCodeReader.open(int) was called from.
        Parameters:
        data - the contents of the preview frame in the format defined by android.graphics.ImageFormat, which can be queried with BarCodeReader.Parameters.getPreviewFormat(). If BarCodeReader.Parameters.setPreviewFormat(int) is never called, the default will be the YCbCr_420_SP (NV21) format.
        reader - the BarCodeReader service object.
